ThingDef.label: kelenken
ThingDef.description: Kelenkens are a favorite war mount for nobles. Larger then a horse with a huge beak capable of ripping apart plate armor, they are not a creature to take lightly. This breed is a omnivore and opportunist eater, this has helped it become the most widespread terror bird breed.

ThingDef.label: paraken
ThingDef.description: Paraken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Paraken are what happens when you make a parrot into a terror bird. Much more docile then many of its cousins, the rainforest allows them to live a more peaceful life. This breed is a herbivore, its large beak will still crush plate armor.

ThingDef.label: penglenken
ThingDef.description: Penglenken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Penglenken are what happens when you make a penguin into a terror bird. This breed is a Carnivore, unlike the penguins it was based off of it is the apex predator in artic regions both under water and above.

ThingDef.label: touken
ThingDef.description: Touken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Touken are what happens when you make a Toucan into a terror bird. This breed is a Carnivore, Something went wrong in its creation and instead of a fruit eating bird we got a highly aggressive tiny terror bird that charges out of the rainforest brush. Of the small Kelenken sub species its beak is the most dangerous, and the creature is incredibly aggressive.

ThingDef.label: vulaken
ThingDef.description: Vulaken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Vulakenare is what happens when you make a Bearded Vulture into a terror bird. This breed is a Carnivore, mostly scavengers they do live in groups and will hunt larger creatures that are vulnerable or alone. Their pack tactics help them stay alive in a hostile environment like the deserts.

ThingDef.label: desert sparaken
ThingDef.description: Desert Sparaken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Desert Sparaken is what happens when you make a Desert Sparrow into a terror bird. This breed is a herbivore, scavenging the desert in groups to find vegetation and nesting spots. Being in family groups helps them scare off predators as they are a more docile and gentile Kelenken breed.

ThingDef.label: pileaken
ThingDef.description: Pileaken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Pileaken is what happens when you make a Pileated pecker into a terror bird. This breed is a omnivore. while it no longer makes holes in trees for nests it does however cut down trees with its peaks to make nests from the trunks. Despite its large size it prefers eating small creatures and plants and is unbothered by the arctics other large creatures.

ThingDef.label: sparaken
ThingDef.description: Sparaken, like all the other Kelenken sub species, are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Sparaken is what happens when you make a Sparrow into a terror bird. This breed is a omnivore. They tend to wander until they find a mate or end up tamed by colony's for their friendly demeanor. In the wild they are largely solitary, but once they bond with something they will never leave that creatures side. Perfect pets even if large and able to rip someone apart. Despite its large size it prefers eating small creatures.

ThingDef.label: heronken
ThingDef.description: Heronken like all the other Kelenken sub species are not a natural occurrence. They were created by a long dead noble house of the empire who had a obsession for terror birds. Heronken are what happens when you make a heron into a terror bird. Living largely in the swamps of the worlds it inhabits. This breed is a Carnivore, its long beak is perfect for catching fish in the waters or picking off large bugs from the air.
